title: Racial Justice Resources
copy: Compiled by the Art Institute's staff equity teams, this list of racial justice resources includes actions you can take, free mental health resources, local and national social justice organizations, articles and organizations committed to ending police brutality, resources for learning and talking about race and racism, and more.
